Author: fizzy_bubblech420
Text: I went to a party with people who’ve been forcing me to ‘get less obsessed with calories’ so while at the peak point of my drunkenness I pretty much hoovered the food off of the table,  Then went out side to smoke, my anemia was making me dizzy when I sat down already so I felt sick and then did throw up. I didn’t do it cause I was disordered just cause I was too drunk but damn did it feel good getting rid of it afterwards.  But usually when I drink I make it a point not to eat after I’ve drank to save both myself and/or the people I’m with.

Author: herdofthebay
Text: I pretend I’m drunk when I’m out at night and puking.  I pretend I’m pregnant with morning sickness when I’m out in daytime.  I’m an open bulimic at my gym because it’s a high end gym where everyone also throws up in the stalls right before spin class like it’s normal routine  I’ve adapted too well...
